text: Hershey Creamery Company is an American ice cream company. It produces ice cream, sorbet, frozen yogurt, and other frozen desserts. The company was founded in 1894. It was one of the first to offer consumers pre-packaged ice cream pints. == Other websites == * Official website Category:1894 establishments in the United States Category:American food companies Category:Ice cream brands
title: Hershey Creamery Company
